meanings.definition: Having more than one level or floor.
meanings.sent1: The multistory building had many floors for people to explore.
meanings.sent2: The new apartment complex is a multistory structure with three levels.
meanings.sent3: The multistory cake was a hit at the party, towering over the other desserts.
meanings.sent4: Her imagination was like a multistory library, filled with endless stories and ideas.
meanings.sent5: The multistory treehouse in the backyard was the envy of all the neighborhood kids.

meanings.definition: A building with multiple levels or floors.
meanings.sent1: The multistory in the city center is a popular shopping destination.
meanings.sent2: The hospital is a multistory with specialized departments on each floor.
meanings.sent3: The multistory seemed to touch the sky, making it a landmark in the town.
meanings.sent4: His mind was like a multistory, each floor holding memories and experiences.
meanings.sent5: The multistory office building offered a breathtaking view of the city skyline.
